subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Francesco Totti scored the opening goal and Roma went on to beat Udinese, 3-2, at home to maintain its 3-point lead over Napoli in the race for Italy’s last direct Champions League spot.
snippet: Francesco Totti scored the opening goal and Roma went on to beat Udinese, 3-2, at home to maintain its 3-point lead over Napoli in the race for Italy’s last direct Champions League spot.
